name: get_coin_price
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool coinranking.
Tool description: A simple API for Cryptocurrency Prices - 28k+ users - Real-Time & Historical - Crypto Market Data - Coins - Exchanges - Free & Paid
API description: With the price endpoint the price can be requested for a specific coin on a specific time. The response is just a single price nearest to the requested time, including its timestamp.

uuid.description: UUID of the cryptocurrency for which the price is needed.

timestamp.description: Epoch timestamp in seconds for the specific price time. Defaults to the latest price if not provided.

referencecurrencyuuid.description:
UUID of reference currency. This is the currency the price is shown in, which defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl
